subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: At stake in this contract battle between Nascar’s most popular driver, Dale Earnhardt Jr., and his stepmother, Teresa Earnhardt, is the future of a company that is the legacy of Dale Earnhardt.
snippet: At stake in this contract battle between Nascar’s most popular driver, Dale Earnhardt Jr., and his stepmother, Teresa Earnhardt, is the future of a company that is the legacy of Dale Earnhardt.
